articles.author: Mark R. Whittington, opinion contributor
articles.title: Israel signs the Artemis Accords in bid to become a space power | TheHill - The Hill
articles.description: By signing the Artemis Accords, Israel will create opportunities for Israeli companies to participate in America’s return to the moon program.
articles.content: Israel has signed the Artemis Accords, a document outlining the rules for space exploration, including mutual cooperation. Israel has thus become the latest member of what some are calling the Artemi… [+4393 chars]
